title: Bugsplatt after first game
body: everytime i want to play league of legends, Bugsplatts are always there to ruin my experience. I try everything the support gives me and well it works for a few games and it comes back again. I dont know why but can anyone help me with my problem or if it has happen to you can you tell me how you fix this problem. I've tried looking on quick ways to fix it on youtube but nothing helps the situation and some are just plain dumb. Give a summoner a hand in need of help. Be much appriciated.

replies.body: I don't see a post history on this account or ticket so I'm not sure what supported suggested, but I'd like to help.  Bugsplat issues usually happen when something with your pc or game files stops working correctly, so it can't load the game.  I suggest that you go over every step of the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to fix this.  I hope that helps!
